appDesc.message: Все фанаты Шерлока должны установить это расширение Новая Вкладка - получить Hd темы с отличной функциональностью.

w_popup_sp.message: Display the current weather for your chosen city!

weathRequestBlocked.message: You can request new Weather every 4 hours, get back to work now!

alert_box.message: Please choose your favorite images first!

sugg_desc.message: Or select from the videos below

faq_content.message:
How do I set the weather?

Open the Settings tab und click on 'weather'. Type in the inputfield the city you want to see. Click on 'Apply' and set the weatherto 'on'.

How can I change the time and temperature format?

Just click on the temperature/time.

Am I able to show my favorite images only?

Open the Background tab and go to 'images'. You can click on the images you like the most and switch the 'Shuffle favorite Images' to 'On'.

How can I view my favorite Youtube videos?

Open the Background tab und click on 'videos'. Type in the input field the video/playlist/user you want to see. Click on 'Submit' to play the video. You can also watch the suggested playlist of 'funny cat videos'.
